game.name: Approach Control: Remastered
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A professional air traffic control simulation, now with voice recognition! Approach Control: Remastered is a realistic air traffic control simulation where you manage arrivals using real procedures, authentic radar behavior, and professional controller workflows in fast-paced, high-stakes scenarios.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A professional air traffic control simulation, now with voice recognition! Approach Control: Remastered is a realistic air traffic control simulation where you manage arrivals using real procedures, authentic radar behavior, and professional controller workflows in fast-paced, high-stakes scenarios.
